app.title: Soul Match
app.subtitle: Discover your soulmate through AI-powered compatibility matching across cultures

userSelection.title: {{name}}'s Soul Selection
userSelection.subtitle: Select your interests (skip uninterested items). Set importance level (1-5 stars) - the higher the score, the deeper your soul connection.
userSelection.completeSelection: Complete selection and share with partner

enterName.title: Enter Your Name
enterName.subtitle: {{user1Name}} has completed their soul profile, now it's your turn to discover your connection!

share.title: Share with {{partnerName}}
share.subtitle: {{userName}} has completed their soul match profile, share the link below with {{partnerName}} to discover your connection!

results.title: Soul Match Results
results.subtitle: Discover your soul connection and explore personalized date activities

errors.sharingDataLost: Sharing data lost, please start over.
errors.userADataIncomplete: User A data incomplete, please complete selection again
errors.ensurePartnerName: Please ensure you have entered User B's name
errors.noResultsData: No results data available to share
errors.incompleteUserData: Sharing data incomplete, please complete match again
errors.copyFailed: Failed to copy {{type}} link, please copy manually

matchResults.noCommonInterests: No common interests, but this is a great opportunity to get to know each other!

tips.title: Tips to Strengthen Your Relationship
tips.commonInterestsTip: Participate in more {{interest}} related activities to create shared memories.
tips.noCommonInterestsTip: Try exploring new interests together to discover new sides of each other.
tips.uniqueInterestsTip: Share your expertise with each other and teach new skills.
tips.noUniqueInterestsTip: Try completely new activities together and grow as a couple.

movie_night.name: Movie Night
movie_night.description: Watch a romantic movie together and enjoy quality time

hiking_date.name: Hiking Date
hiking_date.description: Hike together and enjoy natural scenery

cooking_class.name: Cooking Class
cooking_class.description: Learn to cook delicious meals together

game_night.name: Game Night
game_night.description: Play games together and enjoy friendly competition

coffee_date.name: Coffee Date
coffee_date.description: Enjoy a relaxing time at a coffee shop

errorBoundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong
errorBoundary.subtitle: The app encountered an unexpected error. Please refresh the page or try again later.
